title: A chemical avenue to manipulate field-reentrant superconducting rivalries in infinite layer nickelates
summary: Recently, a preliminary magnetic field-reentrant superconductivity manifested in high critical-temperature (Tc) Eu-doped infinite-layer (IL) nickelates, beyond analogous discoveries exclusively in low-Tc systems. This arises more intriguing fundamental issues about potential quantum-phase boundary and criticality between unconventional superconductivity and field-reentrant-one, which are inexplicable owing to formidable challenges in growing IL-nickelates towards later-series rare-earths. Herein, we demonstrate the 4f-orbital related quantum rivalries between high-Tc and reentrant superconductivity in (Nd1-yRE'y)1-xEuxNiO2 (RE': Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd and Dy) system, via opening up the chemical avenue for a quantum leap in their growths. Robust magnetic field-reentrant superconductivity with uniaxial anisotropy is validated to fringe at boundary of the superconducting dome with optimal-Tc near 40 K. Reinforced reentry is realized via introducing Gd3+ with half-filled deeper 4f-orbital energy-states, compared to Eu2+, that strengthens on-site magnetic-moment. Our findings largely enrich the superconducting phase-diagram for nickelates, establishing an ideal platform for studying 4f-related unconventional superconductivity and quantum criticality.

AI.tldr: 该论文在Eu掺杂无限层镍酸盐中发现了高温超导与磁场重入超导的量子竞争，通过化学方法成功生长了含不同稀土元素的镍酸盐，揭示了4f轨道相关的量子临界性。
AI.motivation: 先前在Eu掺杂无限层镍酸盐中观察到的磁场重入超导现象仅限于低温系统，而高温超导与重入超导之间的量子相边界和临界性机制尚不清楚。由于生长含重稀土元素的无限层镍酸盐存在技术挑战，相关研究受到限制。
AI.method: 开发了化学生长方法，成功制备了(Nd1-yRE'y)1-xEuxNiO2系列材料（RE'包括Pr、Nd、Sm、Gd和Dy）。通过系统研究不同稀土元素掺杂对超导性质的影响，特别是4f轨道电子态的作用，探索了高温超导与磁场重入超导的竞争关系。
AI.result: 在超导穹顶边界（最佳Tc约40K附近）观察到具有单轴各向异性的稳健磁场重入超导现象。引入具有半填充更深4f轨道能态的Gd3+离子（相比Eu2+）增强了局域磁矩，从而强化了重入超导效应。
AI.conclusion: 该研究极大地丰富了镍酸盐的超导相图，建立了一个研究4f轨道相关非常规超导和量子临界性的理想平台，揭示了稀土元素4f轨道在超导竞争中的关键作用。

title: Evidence for Anion-Free-Electron Duality and Enhanced Superconducting Role of Interstitial Anionic Electrons in Electrides
summary: The discovery of superconducting electrides, characterized by interstitial anionic electrons (IAEs) residing in lattice cavities, has established a distinctive platform for investigating superconductors. Yet the superconducting origin and the fundamental role of IAEs in Cooper pairing formation remain poorly understood due to the challenges in directly observing IAEs. Here, combining angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (ARPES), transport measurements, and first-principles calculations, we certify that the IAEs in electride La3In (Tc = 9.4 K) exhibit a dual nature as both anions and free electrons. With the finite-depth potential well model, we trace that IAEs originate from electronic states near the Fermi level located above potential barriers, forming a Fermi sea susceptible to scattering by La-derived phonons, triggering superconductivity. ARPES combined with high-resolution XRD measurements on oxygen-treated samples directly reveals IAEs' spatial distribution and energy dispersion from interstitial sites with the consistent energy value predicted by our theory model. The concomitant diminution of free electrons upon oxygen treatment, leading to a marked reduction in superconductivity, further provides compelling experimental evidence that IAEs actively participate in electron-phonon coupling. Our findings resolve the long-standing ambiguity regarding the electronic nature of IAEs, elucidate their enhancing superconductivity in the phonon-mediated mechanism, and provide a foundation for exploring advanced electride-based superconductors.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过实验和理论方法揭示了电子化合物La3In中填隙阴离子电子(IAEs)的双重性质及其在超导配对中的关键作用，解决了长期存在的IAEs电子性质模糊问题。
AI.motivation: 电子化合物超导体中的填隙阴离子电子(IAEs)在超导配对形成中的基本作用和超导起源尚不清楚，主要由于直接观测IAEs存在挑战。
AI.method: 结合角分辨光电子能谱(ARPES)、输运测量和第一性原理计算，使用有限深度势阱模型分析IAEs起源，并通过氧处理样品的ARPES和高分辨率XRD直接观测IAEs的空间分布和能量色散。
AI.result: 证实La3In中的IAEs具有阴离子和自由电子的双重性质；IAEs起源于费米能级附近的电子态，形成易受La衍生声子散射的费米海；氧处理导致自由电子减少，超导性显著降低，证明IAEs积极参与电子-声子耦合。
AI.conclusion: 研究解决了IAEs电子性质的长期模糊性，阐明了其在声子介导机制中增强超导性的作用，为探索先进电子化合物超导体奠定了基础。

title: Thermally-controlled flux avalanche dynamics in bulk NbTi superconductor
summary: We report the first direct visualization of flux avalanche propagation dynamics in bulk superconducting NbTi, tracking individual events and measuring their velocities using high-speed magneto-optical imaging. Unlike thin films with electromagnetic avalanches at km/s speeds, we observe velocities of 15--25 m/s, which are orders of magnitude slower. Analysis of characteristic timescales reveals that these avalanches are governed by local heating and limited heat dissipation through the adhesive layer, establishing a fundamentally different, thermally limited propagation regime. The threshold field for avalanche nucleation decreases with temperature, contrary to the increasing trend in thin films with efficient cooling - a behavior consistent with slow heat removal and thermal runaway in our system. All observed avalanches exhibit universal normalized velocity-distance scaling despite varying morphologies, confirming the robustness of thermal control. These findings reveal that bulk superconductors with poor thermal coupling operate in a previously uncharacterized avalanche regime, with direct implications for flux stability and quench protection in NbTi-based magnets, as well as a broader understanding of thermomagnetic instabilities in technological superconductors.

AI.tldr: 首次直接可视化NbTi块体超导体中的磁通雪崩传播动力学，发现其速度比薄膜慢3-4个数量级，由热传导而非电磁效应主导，揭示了新的热限制传播机制。
AI.motivation: 研究块体超导体中的磁通雪崩动力学，特别是NbTi材料在技术应用中的磁通稳定性和淬火保护问题。现有研究主要集中在薄膜超导体，对块体材料的热磁不稳定性机制了解不足。
AI.method: 使用高速磁光成像技术直接可视化NbTi块体超导体中的磁通雪崩传播动态，追踪单个事件并测量其速度，分析特征时间尺度。
AI.result: 观察到15-25 m/s的速度，比薄膜超导体（km/s量级）慢3-4个数量级；雪崩由局部加热和粘附层有限热耗散控制；阈值场随温度降低而减小；所有雪崩表现出普适的归一化速度-距离标度关系。
AI.conclusion: 块体超导体在热耦合不良条件下运行于先前未表征的热限制雪崩机制，这对NbTi基磁体的磁通稳定性和淬火保护有直接意义，并深化了对技术超导体热磁不稳定性的理解。

title: Thermodynamics of the Heisenberg antiferromagnet on the maple-leaf lattice
summary: We study the Heisenberg antiferromagnet on the maple-leaf lattice using several numerical approaches, focusing on the numerical linked-cluster expansion (NLCE), which exhibits an unconventional convergence extending to low and even zero temperatures. We evaluate thermodynamic properties as well as spin-spin correlations through the equal-time structure factor. Within NLCE the specific heat capacity reveals a two-peak structure at $T_1 \approx 0.479\,J$ and $T_2 \approx 0.131\,J$, reminiscent of the corresponding result for the triangular lattice. At intermediate temperatures, the spin-spin structure factor develops features that reflect the absence of reflection symmetry in the lattice. The zero-temperature convergence of NLCE enables reliable estimates of the ground-state energy and points to a short-range correlated paramagnetic ground state composed of resonating hexagonal motifs. The NLCE results are benchmarked against Pseudo-Majorana Functional Renormalization Group, finite-temperature Lanczos, and classical Monte Carlo simulations.

AI.tldr: 使用多种数值方法研究枫叶晶格上的海森堡反铁磁体，重点展示数值链接团簇展开(NLCE)在低温甚至零温下的非常规收敛性，揭示了比热双峰结构和基态短程关联特性。
AI.motivation: 研究枫叶晶格上海森堡反铁磁体的热力学性质和基态特性，该晶格缺乏反射对称性，为理解几何阻挫系统的物理行为提供新视角。
AI.method: 采用数值链接团簇展开(NLCE)作为主要方法，并结合伪马约拉纳泛函重整化群、有限温度Lanczos方法和经典蒙特卡洛模拟进行基准测试。
AI.result: 比热在T1≈0.479J和T2≈0.131J处呈现双峰结构；自旋-自旋结构因子在中间温度显示晶格非反射对称性特征；NLCE零温收敛表明基态能量可靠，指向由共振六边形图案组成的短程关联顺磁基态。
AI.conclusion: NLCE在枫叶晶格上表现出非常规的低温收敛特性，成功揭示了该几何阻挫系统的热力学行为和基态特征，为研究其他复杂晶格系统提供了有力工具。

title: Machine-Learned Interatomic Potentials for Structural and Defect Properties of YBa$_2$Cu$_3$O$_{7-δ}$
summary:
High-Temperature Superconductors (HTS) such as YBa2Cu3O7-delta (YBCO) are essential for next-generation Tokamak fusion reactors, where Rare-Earth Barium Copper Oxides (REBCO) form the functional layers in HTS magnets. Because YBCO's superconductivity depends strongly on oxygen stoichiometry and defect structure, atomistic simulations can provide crucial insight into radiation-damage mechanisms and pathways to maintain material performance.
  In this work, we develop and benchmark four Machine-Learned Interatomic Potentials (MLPs) for YBCO: the Atomic Cluster Expansion (ACE), the Message-Passing Atomic Cluster Expansion (MACE), the Gaussian Approximation Potential (GAP), and the Tabulated Gaussian Approximation Potential (tabGAP), trained on an extensive Density Functional Theory (DFT) database explicitly designed to include irradiation-damaged-like configurations. The resulting models achieve DFT-level accuracy across a wide range of atomic environments, faithfully capturing the interatomic forces relevant to radiation damage processes.
  Among the tested models, MACE delivers the highest accuracy, although at greater computational cost, while ACE and tabGAP provide an excellent balance between efficiency and fidelity. These machine-learned potentials establish a robust foundation for large-scale molecular dynamics simulations of radiation-induced defect evolution in complex superconducting materials

AI.tldr: 开发并评估了四种机器学习原子间势能模型（ACE、MACE、GAP、tabGAP）用于YBCO高温超导材料，这些模型基于DFT数据库训练，能够准确模拟辐射损伤过程，为大规模分子动力学模拟提供基础。
AI.motivation: YBCO等高温超导材料在托卡马克聚变反应堆中至关重要，但其超导性能强烈依赖于氧化学计量和缺陷结构。辐射损伤会影响材料性能，因此需要通过原子尺度模拟来理解辐射损伤机制并维持材料性能。
AI.method: 开发了四种机器学习原子间势能模型（ACE、MACE、GAP、tabGAP），这些模型基于专门设计的DFT数据库训练，该数据库包含了辐射损伤类似构型。通过基准测试评估了这些模型在广泛原子环境中的准确性。
AI.result: 所有模型都达到了DFT级别的精度，能够准确捕捉辐射损伤过程中的原子间力。其中MACE模型精度最高但计算成本较大，ACE和tabGAP在效率和精度之间提供了最佳平衡。
AI.conclusion: 这些机器学习势能模型为复杂超导材料中辐射诱导缺陷演化的大规模分子动力学模拟建立了坚实基础，有助于理解高温超导材料在聚变反应堆环境中的性能变化。

title: Obstruction to Ergodicity from Locality and $U(1)$ Higher Symmetries on the Lattice
summary: We argue that the presence of \emph{any} exact $U(1)$ higher-form symmetry, under mild assumptions, presents a fundamental obstruction to ergodicity under unitary dynamics in lattice systems with local interactions and finite on-site Hilbert space dimension. Focusing on the two-dimensional case, we show that such systems necessarily exhibit Hilbert space fragmentation and explicitly construct Krylov sectors whose number scales exponentially with system size. While these sectors cannot be distinguished by symmetry quantum numbers, we identify the emergent integrals of motion which characterize them. Our symmetry-based approach is insensitive to details of the Hamiltonian and the lattice, providing a systematic explanation for ergodicity-breaking in a range of systems, including quantum link models.

AI.tldr: 具有精确U(1)高阶对称性的二维格点系统必然表现出希尔伯特空间碎片化，导致指数级数量的Krylov子空间，破坏了量子热化。
AI.motivation: 研究高阶对称性如何从根本上阻碍量子系统的遍历性，为理解各种系统中观察到的热化破坏现象提供系统性解释。
AI.method: 基于对称性的分析方法，专注于二维格点系统，构造指数级数量的Krylov子空间，识别表征这些子空间的涌现守恒量。
AI.result: 证明具有精确U(1)高阶对称性的系统必然表现出希尔伯特空间碎片化，Krylov子空间数量随系统尺寸指数增长，这些子空间无法用对称性量子数区分。
AI.conclusion: 高阶对称性为理解格点系统中遍历性破坏提供了统一框架，适用于量子链模型等多种系统，且对哈密顿量和晶格细节不敏感。

title: Shaping Causality: Emergence of Nonlocal Light Cones in Long-Range Quantum Systems
summary: While for non-relativistic short-range interactions, the spread of information is local, remaining confined in an effective light cone, long-range interactions can generate either nonlocal (faster-than-ballistic) or local (ballistic) spread of correlations depending on the initial conditions. This makes long-range interactions a rich platform for controlling the spread of information. Here, we derive an effective Hamiltonian analytically and identify the specific interaction term that drives nonlocality in a wide class of long-range spin chains. This allows us to understand the conditions for the emergence of local behavior in the presence of nonlocal interactions and to identify a regime where the causal space-time landscape can be precisely designed. Indeed, we show that for large long-range interaction strength or large system size, initial conditions can be chosen in a way that allows a local perturbation to generate nonlocal signals at programmable distant positions, which then propagate within effective light cones. The possibility of engineering the emergence of nonlocal Lieb-Robinson-like light cones allows one to shape the causal landscape of long-range interacting systems, with direct applications to quantum information processing devices, quantum memories, error correction, and information transport in programmable quantum simulators.

AI.tldr: 长程相互作用系统中信息传播的非局域性与局域性可控性研究
AI.motivation: 长程相互作用系统具有丰富的信息传播特性，既可以产生非局域（超弹道）传播，也可以产生局域（弹道）传播，这为控制信息传播提供了平台。研究旨在理解非局域相互作用下局域行为出现的条件，并设计可编程的因果时空景观。
AI.method: 通过解析推导有效哈密顿量，识别驱动长程自旋链中非局域性的特定相互作用项。分析大长程相互作用强度或大系统尺寸下的初始条件选择。
AI.result: 发现可以通过选择初始条件，使局域扰动在可编程的远距离位置产生非局域信号，这些信号随后在有效光锥内传播。实现了对非局域Lieb-Robinson类光锥出现的工程化控制。
AI.conclusion: 长程相互作用系统可以实现因果景观的可编程设计，这在量子信息处理设备、量子存储器、纠错和可编程量子模拟器中的信息传输等方面具有直接应用价值。

title: Exceptional points and spectral cusps from density-wave fluctuation
summary: We report two types of singularities that arise from fluctuations during the formation of charge- or spin-density waves. The first is the exceptional point (EP), corresponding to a higher-order pole of the retarded Green's function. Such EPs lead to algebraic corrections in the decay of quasiparticle occupations and are observable through time-resolved angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (Tr-ARPES). The second is a spectral cusp, defined by the coalescence of three extrema in the real-frequency spectral function $A(\mathbf{k}, ω)$. This cusp enforces the formation of Fermi arcs and induces a "threading" structure in the nearby band structure, both of which are directly observable in ARPES.

AI.tldr: 论文报告了电荷/自旋密度波形成过程中涨落引起的两类奇点：异常点（高阶极点）和谱尖点（三极值合并），两者均可通过光电子能谱观测。
AI.motivation: 研究密度波形成过程中涨落导致的奇异现象，探索这些奇点对电子结构和动力学的物理影响，为实验观测提供理论指导。
AI.method: 理论分析涨落对推迟格林函数的影响，识别异常点（高阶极点）和谱尖点（三极值合并）的形成机制，预测其在光电子能谱中的特征。
AI.result: 发现异常点导致准粒子占据数的代数衰减修正，可通过时间分辨角分辨光电子能谱观测；谱尖点强制形成费米弧并在附近能带结构中产生"穿线"结构，可直接在角分辨光电子能谱中观测。
AI.conclusion: 密度波形成过程中的涨落会产生两类可观测的奇点，这些奇点对电子结构和动力学有重要影响，为实验研究提供了新的理论框架和观测特征。

title: IRSSG: An Open-Source Software Package for Spin Space Groups
summary: We present an open-source software package IRSSG for investigating magnetic systems with spin space groups (SSGs). The package works within the density functional theory (DFT) framework and requires wavefunctions from DFT codes, such as VASP, Quantum ESPRESSO, as well as any other code that has an interface to Wannier90. We introduce a set of compact SSG international symbols by combining non-crystallographic point groups with the 230 crystallographic space groups. The program first identifies all SSG operations and determines the SSG international symbol for a given magnetic system. It then generates the SSG character tables of little groups at any $k$ point. Finally, it computes the traces of matrix presentations of SSG operations and assigns irreducible corepresentation labels to magnetic energy bands. The program is not only timely but also essential for advancing research on the study of magnons, altermagnetism, magnetic topology, and novel high-degeneracy excitations in SSG systems.

AI.tldr: IRSSG是一个用于研究自旋空间群磁系统的开源软件包，基于密度泛函理论框架，可识别自旋空间群操作、生成特征表并为磁能带分配不可约表示标签。
AI.motivation: 随着对磁系统研究的深入，特别是对磁振子、交替磁性、磁拓扑和新型高简并激发的研究，需要专门的工具来分析自旋空间群系统。现有工具缺乏对自旋空间群的系统支持，限制了这些领域的研究进展。
AI.method: 该软件包工作在密度泛函理论框架下，需要来自VASP、Quantum ESPRESSO等DFT代码的波函数。通过结合非晶点群与230个晶格空间群，引入紧凑的自旋空间群国际符号。程序首先识别所有自旋空间群操作并确定系统的自旋空间群国际符号，然后在任意k点生成小群的特征表，最后计算自旋空间群操作的矩阵表示迹，并为磁能带分配不可约表示标签。
AI.result: 开发了IRSSG开源软件包，能够自动识别磁系统的自旋空间群，生成特征表，并为能带分配不可约表示标签。该工具支持多种主流DFT代码，为磁系统研究提供了系统化的分析框架。
AI.conclusion: IRSSG软件包是研究自旋空间群磁系统的及时且必要的工具，将显著推动磁振子、交替磁性、磁拓扑和新型高简并激发等领域的研究进展。

title: A Self-Adjusting FEM-BEM Coupling Scheme for the Nonlinear Poisson-Boltzmann Equation
summary: The Poisson-Boltzmann equation is widely used to model molecular electrostatics; however, it is usually solved in linearised form because the sinh nonlinearity is challenging, limiting its applicability in highly charged systems such as nucleic acids. This work presents a solution method for the nonlinear Poisson-Boltzmann equation based on a coupled finite/boundary element scheme that automatically finds an optimal relaxation parameter, ensuring fast and reliable convergence of the nonlinear solver without user intervention. We validated our solver against APBS for a spherical cavity, and used RNA-based structures to perform a thorough study of the different algorithmic choices, and to test our implementation. We found that the best alternative to solve the Poisson-Boltzmann equation was using a Newton-Raphson method where the nonlinearity was gradually introduced with a cubic approximation in the first iteration. Newton-Raphson was also the best method to find the optimal relaxation factor, reducing the number of iterations by 40%. Including other optimisation techniques, we were able to obtain a 1.37x speed-up with respect to the best hand-picked relaxation factor for 1HC8 (molecule with highest charge in our tests), avoiding any trial-and-error process to find the relaxation factor.

AI.tldr: 提出一种非线性泊松-玻尔兹曼方程的自动优化求解方法，通过耦合有限元/边界元方案和自适应松弛参数，实现快速收敛，无需人工干预
AI.motivation: 传统的泊松-玻尔兹曼方程通常采用线性化形式求解，因为其sinh非线性项难以处理，限制了在高电荷系统（如核酸）中的应用。需要开发能够自动处理非线性项的可靠求解方法。
AI.method: 采用耦合有限元/边界元方案，开发自动寻找最优松弛参数的非线性求解器。使用牛顿-拉夫森方法，并在首次迭代中采用三次近似逐步引入非线性。该方法能够自动确定最优松弛因子，避免试错过程。
AI.result: 验证表明，牛顿-拉夫森方法配合逐步引入非线性的策略是最佳选择。最优松弛因子的自动寻找使迭代次数减少40%。对于测试中电荷最高的1HC8分子，相比手动选择松弛因子，获得了1.37倍的加速。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功解决了非线性泊松-玻尔兹曼方程的求解难题，实现了自动优化和快速收敛，特别适用于高电荷生物分子系统，避免了传统方法中需要人工试错的局限性。

title: Electronic Transport Switching by Electric field Driven Tautomerism in Single and Fused Metal-free Benziporphyrins
summary: The capacity of many metal-free porphyrins (MFPs) to exhibit different H-bonded tautomers provides a platform for exploring the effects of reversible molecular changes on electronic transport. On-surface and molecular junction experiments have shown that tautomerism in single MFPs can be controlled by the magnitude of the current passing through them. Such conductance-based results confirm the potential for tautomeric switching but are not easily translated into device applications, where faster electric-field-gated switching is generally preferred. Previous work has focused on highly symmetric MFPs with four identical pyrrole rings, in which tautomers correspond to different H-N configurations of two protons. Here, we consider a synthesized metal-free benziporphyrin in which one pyrrole ring is replaced by a phenol moiety. This modification lowers the symmetry and increases the tautomer-dependence of the electronic state. The structural anisotropy of benziporphyrins also enhances their selective response to applied E-fields. Here, we use density functional theory and quantum electron-transport calculations to assess: (i) the statistical distribution of three distinct benziporphyrin tautomers under different applied E-fields, and (ii) the transport characteristics of each tautomer. We find that moderate E-fields can influence the tautomerism and that each tautomer exhibits distinct transport signatures, confirming that single metal-free benziporphyrins have potential to act as three-state molecular switches. By fusing two benziporphyrins, we show that the larger manifold of tautomeric states retains distinct transport signatures, opening the way to multistate molecular registers. Finally, we show that fused benziporphyrins can also act as molecular wires with enhanced conductance relative to a single unit.

AI.tldr: 金属自由苯并卟啉可作为三态分子开关，电场可调控其互变异构体分布，不同异构体具有独特的输运特征，融合后可实现多态分子寄存器功能。
AI.motivation: 传统金属自由卟啉的互变异构开关受电流控制，难以应用于需要电场门控开关的实际器件。苯并卟啉通过降低对称性和引入结构各向异性，增强了对电场的响应能力，为开发电场可控的多态分子开关提供了新平台。
AI.method: 使用密度泛函理论和量子电子输运计算，评估：(1)不同外加电场下三种苯并卟啉互变异构体的统计分布；(2)每种异构体的输运特性。通过融合两个苯并卟啉单元，研究其多态分子寄存器潜力。
AI.result: 中等强度电场可调控苯并卟啉的互变异构现象，三种异构体展现出独特的输运特征，证实其可作为三态分子开关。融合后的苯并卟啉保留了各异构体的独特输运特征，可实现多态分子寄存器功能，同时融合结构还表现出比单单元更高的电导率，可作为分子导线使用。
AI.conclusion: 金属自由苯并卟啉通过结构修饰实现了电场可控的互变异构开关，为开发多态分子电子器件提供了有前景的平台，融合结构进一步扩展了其在分子寄存器和分子导线方面的应用潜力。

title: Correlations between superconducting and resistive anisotropies
summary: There are multiple possible origins of transport anisotropies in metals and superconductors. For instance, rotational symmetry can be spontaneously broken in the normal state as a result of electronic nematic order inducing anisotropies in an otherwise $s$-wave superconducting phase. Another possibility is that the dominant source of rotational symmetry breaking is the superconductor itself and its vestiges that may survive in the normal state. We here theoretically analyze the correlations of transport anisotropies in the normal and the corresponding superconducting phase for different scenarios of broken symmetry, either coming solely from the normal state, solely from the superconductor and its vestiges in the metallic regimes, or from both simultaneously. We further include both zero-momentum and finite-momentum pairing; we develop a theory of vestigial order for the latter, characterized by broken rotational and translational symmetry. Our findings reveal that the relative transport anisotropies in the normal and superconducting phases sensitively depend on the scenario, including the form of vestigial order and, in some cases, the parity of the superconducting order parameter. As such, measuring the directional dependence of the critical current and resistivity can provide strong constraints on the origin of rotational symmetry breaking. We demonstrate our findings in minimal models relevant to twisted multilayer graphene, rhombohedral graphene, and twisted transition metal dichalcogenides.

AI.tldr: 该理论研究不同对称性破缺场景下正常态和超导态输运各向异性的相关性，包括正常态电子向列序、超导序本身及其残余效应，以及零动量和有限动量配对，为实验测量提供理论指导。
AI.motivation: 金属和超导体中输运各向异性的起源有多种可能：正常态电子向列序、超导序本身及其在正常态的残余效应。需要系统分析不同对称性破缺场景下正常态和超导态输运各向异性的相关性，以区分不同物理机制。
AI.method: 理论分析不同对称性破缺场景：1) 仅来自正常态；2) 仅来自超导序及其残余效应；3) 两者同时存在。包含零动量和有限动量配对，为后者发展具有破缺旋转和平移对称性的残余序理论。
AI.result: 发现正常态和超导态的相对输运各向异性敏感依赖于具体场景，包括残余序的形式，在某些情况下还依赖于超导序参数的宇称。临界电流和电阻率的方向依赖性测量能为旋转对称性破缺的起源提供强约束。
AI.conclusion: 通过测量临界电流和电阻率的方向依赖性，可以区分输运各向异性的不同起源机制。该理论框架适用于扭曲多层石墨烯、菱面体石墨烯和扭曲过渡金属二硫化物等体系。

title: Pervasive electronic nematicity as the parent state of kagome superconductors
summary: Kagome superconductors $A$V$_3$Sb$_5$ ($A$ = Cs, K, Rb) have developed into an exciting playground for realizing and exploring exotic solid state phenomena. Abundant experimental evidence suggests that electronic structure breaks rotational symmetry of the lattice, but whether this may be a simple consequence of the symmetry of the underlying 2 $\times$ 2 charge density wave phase or an entirely different mechanism remains intensely debated. We use spectroscopic imaging scanning tunneling microscopy to explore the phase diagram of the prototypical kagome superconductor CsV$_3$Sb$_5$ as a function of doping. We intentionally suppress the charge density wave phase with chemical substitutions selectively introduced at two distinct lattice sites, and investigate the resulting system. We discover that rotational symmetry breaking of the electronic structure -- now present in short-range nanoscale regions -- persists in all samples, in a wide doping range long after all charge density waves have been suppressed. As such, our experiments uncover ubiquitous electronic nematicity across the $A$V$_3$Sb$_5$ phase diagram, unrelated to the 2 $\times$ 2 charge density wave. This further points towards electronic nematicity as the intrinsic nature of the parent state of kagome superconductors, under which other exotic low-temperature phenomena subsequently emerge.

AI.tldr: Kagome超导体CsV₃Sb₅中，通过化学掺杂抑制电荷密度波后，发现电子结构旋转对称性破缺依然存在，表明电子向列性是这类材料的本征性质，而非电荷密度波的简单结果。
AI.motivation: Kagome超导体AV₃Sb₅中电子结构旋转对称性破缺的来源存在激烈争议：是2×2电荷密度波相的直接结果，还是完全不同的机制？需要澄清这一基本问题。
AI.method: 使用光谱成像扫描隧道显微镜研究CsV₃Sb₅的相图随掺杂的变化。通过在两个不同晶格位点选择性引入化学取代，有意抑制电荷密度波相，并研究所得系统。
AI.result: 发现电子结构旋转对称性破缺在所有样品中都持续存在，即使在电荷密度波被完全抑制的宽掺杂范围内，仍以短程纳米尺度区域的形式出现。这表明电子向列性普遍存在于AV₃Sb₅相图中，与2×2电荷密度波无关。
AI.conclusion: 电子向列性是Kagome超导体的本征母态性质，在这一母态下其他奇异的低温现象随后出现。这一发现澄清了旋转对称性破缺的来源问题。

title: Entropy production and non-Gaussianity of fast processes at weak damping
summary: We present a method of estimating the rate of entropy production in underdamped dynamics by decomposing it into contributions originating in different non-equilibrium effects. Specifically, a non-zero average velocity, a non-thermal width of the velocity distribution, correlations between position and velocity and non-Gaussian velocity statistics represent different ways in which the system can be out of equilibrium and each give rise to a positive contribution to the overall entropy production rate. We demonstrate that each contribution can be separately estimated from experimental trajectory data of levitated nano-particles subject to non-linear forces. We find that the majority of the entropy production rate can be attributed to the first three contributions which can be estimated from the first and second moments of the position and velocity and therefore result in a useful \enquote{Gaussian} estimate for the entropy production rate.

AI.tldr: 提出一种估计欠阻尼动力学中熵产生率的方法，通过将其分解为不同非平衡效应的贡献，包括平均速度、速度分布宽度、位置-速度相关性及非高斯统计，并应用于光学悬浮纳米粒子实验数据。
AI.motivation: 在非平衡系统中，熵产生率是量化系统远离平衡程度的关键指标。传统方法难以区分不同非平衡效应的具体贡献，需要开发能够分解熵产生率来源的方法，以更精细地理解非平衡动力学。
AI.method: 将欠阻尼动力学中的熵产生率分解为四个独立的正贡献项：非零平均速度、非热速度分布宽度、位置-速度相关性以及非高斯速度统计。利用光学悬浮纳米粒子在非线性力场中的实验轨迹数据，分别估计各项贡献。
AI.result: 实验表明，前三项贡献（平均速度、速度分布宽度、位置-速度相关性）占总熵产生率的大部分，这些项仅需位置和速度的一阶和二阶矩即可估计，从而提供了一种有效的"高斯"熵产生率估计方法。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功实现了熵产生率来源的分解，揭示了不同非平衡效应的相对重要性。前三项基于低阶矩的贡献占主导，为实验测量熵产生率提供了实用且高效的估计策略。

title: Quantum Wigner solid in two-dimensional electron systems in semiconductors
comment: Advances in Physics: X, in press
summary: We review recent transport experiments that reveal two-threshold voltage-current characteristics, marked by a significant increase in noise between the two threshold voltages, at low electron densities in the insulating regime in two-dimensional (2D) electron systems, specifically in silicon metal-oxide-semiconductor field-effect transistors (MOSFETs) and SiGe/Si/SiGe heterostructures. The double-threshold voltage-current characteristics closely resemble those observed in the collective depinning of the vortex lattice in type-II superconductors. By adapting the model used for vortices to the case of an electron solid, good agreement with the experimental results is achieved, which supports a quantum electron solid forming in the low electron density state. When a perpendicular magnetic field is applied, the double-threshold behavior occurs at voltages an order of magnitude lower and at significantly higher electron densities than the zero-field case. This indicates the stabilization of the quantum electron solid, aligning with theoretical predictions. Interestingly, the double-threshold voltage-current curves, indicative of electron solid formation at low densities, are not observed in the quantum Hall regime. This lack of observation does not confirm the existence of a quasi-particle quantum Hall Wigner solid and indicates that quasi-particles near integer filling do not form an independent subsystem.

AI.tldr: 在二维电子系统的绝缘态中观察到双阈值电压-电流特性，类似于超导体中涡旋晶格的集体脱钉行为，支持低电子密度下量子电子固体的形成。
AI.motivation: 研究二维电子系统在低电子密度绝缘态下的输运特性，探索是否存在量子电子固体（Wigner晶体）的形成。
AI.method: 在硅MOSFET和SiGe/Si/SiGe异质结构中测量低电子密度下的电压-电流特性，观察双阈值行为和噪声特征。将超导体涡旋晶集体脱钉模型应用于电子固体进行理论分析。
AI.result: 实验观察到明显的双阈值电压-电流特性，两个阈值电压之间存在显著噪声增加。施加垂直磁场时，双阈值行为出现在低一个数量级的电压和更高电子密度下。但在量子霍尔态中未观察到类似特征。
AI.conclusion: 双阈值行为支持低电子密度下量子电子固体的形成，磁场能稳定该固体。量子霍尔态中未观测到类似特征，表明整数填充因子附近的准粒子不形成独立子系统。

title: Effect of Magneto-Mechanical Synergism in the Process-Structure Correlation in Fe-C Alloys: A Phase-Field Modeling Approach
summary: Applied magnetic fields can alter phase equilibria and kinetics in steels; however, quantitatively resolving how magnetic, chemical, and elastic driving forces jointly influence the microstructure remains challenging. We develop a quantitative magneto-mechanically coupled phase-field model for the Fe-C system that couples a CALPHAD-based chemical free energy with demagnetization-field magnetostatics and microelasticity. The model reproduces single- and multi-particle evolution during the alpha to gamma inverse transformation at 1023 K under external fields up to 20 T, including ellipsoidal morphologies observed experimentally at 8 T. Chemically driven growth is isotropic; a magnetic interaction introduces an anisotropic driving force that elongates gamma precipitates along the field into ellipsoids, while elastic coherency promotes faceting, yielding elongated cuboidal or ``brick-like" particles under combined magneto-elastic coupling. Growth kinetics increase with C content, and decrease with field strength and misfit strain. Multi-particle simulations reveal dipolar interaction-mediated coalescence for field-parallel neighbors and ripening for field-perpendicular neighbors. Incorporating field-dependent diffusivity from experiment slows kinetics as expected; a first-principles-motivated anisotropic diffusivity correction is estimated to be small (<2%). These results establish a process-structure link for magnetically assisted heat treatments of Fe-C alloys and provide guidance for microstructure control via chemo-magneto-mechanical synergism.

AI.tldr: 开发了Fe-C系统的磁-机械耦合相场模型，定量研究磁场、化学和弹性驱动力共同对微观结构的影响，揭示了磁场下α→γ逆相变中γ析出物的形态演变和生长动力学规律。
AI.motivation: 磁场可以改变钢的相平衡和动力学，但定量解析磁、化学和弹性驱动力如何共同影响微观结构仍然具有挑战性。需要建立定量模型来理解这些驱力的协同作用。
AI.method: 开发了Fe-C系统的定量磁-机械耦合相场模型，将CALPHAD基化学自由能与退磁场磁静力学和微弹性耦合。模型模拟了1023K下α→γ逆相变在高达20T外场中的单粒子和多粒子演化。
AI.result: 模型成功再现了实验观察到的8T磁场下的椭球形态。化学驱动力导致各向同性生长，磁相互作用引入各向异性驱动力使γ析出物沿磁场方向伸长成椭球，弹性相干性促进刻面化，在磁-弹性耦合下产生伸长立方体或"砖状"颗粒。生长动力学随C含量增加而增加，随磁场强度和失配应变减小。多粒子模拟揭示了场平行邻居的偶极相互作用介导的聚结和场垂直邻居的熟化。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了Fe-C合金磁辅助热处理的过程-结构联系，为通过化学-磁-机械协同作用控制微观结构提供了指导。

title: A multi-language auto-differentiation module and its application to a parallel particle-in-cell code on distributed computers
summary: The auto differentiable simulation is a type of simulation that outputs of the simulation include not only the simulation result itself, but also their derivatives with respect to various input parameters. It provides an efficient method to study sensitivity of the simulation results with respect to the input parameters. Furthermore, it can be used in gradient based optimization methods for rapidly optimizing design parameters. In this paper, we present the development of a fast and transparent auto-differentiation module/class designed for easy integration into numerous simulation codes. As an application, this auto-differentiation module is integrated into a parallel particle-in-cell code with message passing interface (MPI) on distributed memory computers.

AI.tldr: 开发了一个快速透明的自动微分模块，可轻松集成到各种仿真代码中，并成功应用于并行粒子网格代码
AI.motivation: 自动微分仿真不仅能输出仿真结果，还能提供结果对输入参数的导数，这对于研究仿真结果的敏感性以及基于梯度的设计参数优化非常重要。然而，现有自动微分工具往往难以集成到复杂的仿真代码中。
AI.method: 开发了一个快速透明的自动微分模块/类，设计为易于集成到多种仿真代码中。将该模块集成到基于MPI的分布式内存计算机上的并行粒子网格代码中作为应用示例。
AI.result: 成功开发了一个可集成到复杂仿真代码中的自动微分模块，并在并行粒子网格代码中实现了集成，展示了该模块的实际应用能力。
AI.conclusion: 开发的自动微分模块为各种仿真代码提供了高效的敏感性分析和梯度优化能力，特别是在高性能计算环境中具有重要应用价值。

title: QuantumChem-200K: A Large-Scale Open Organic Molecular Dataset for Quantum-Chemistry Property Screening and Language Model Benchmarking
summary: The discovery of next-generation photoinitiators for two-photon polymerization (TPP) is hindered by the absence of large, open datasets containing the quantum-chemical and photophysical properties required to model photodissociation and excited-state behavior. Existing molecular datasets typically provide only basic physicochemical descriptors and therefore cannot support data-driven screening or AI-assisted design of photoinitiators. To address this gap, we introduce QuantumChem-200K, a large-scale dataset of over 200,000 organic molecules annotated with eleven quantum-chemical properties, including two-photon absorption (TPA) cross sections, TPA spectral ranges, singlet-triplet intersystem crossing (ISC) energies, toxicity and synthetic accessibility scores, hydrophilicity, solubility, boiling point, molecular weight, and aromaticity. These values are computed using a hybrid workflow that integrates density function theory (DFT), semi-empirical excited-state methods, atomistic quantum solvers, and neural-network predictors. Using QuantumChem-200K, we fine tune the open-source Qwen2.5-32B large language model to create a chemistry AI assistant capable of forward property prediction from SMILES. Benchmarking on 3000 unseen molecules from VQM24 and ZINC20 demonstrates that domain-specific fine-tuning significantly improves accuracy over GPT-4o, Llama-3.1-70B, and the base Qwen2.5-32B model, particularly for TPA and ISC predictions central to photoinitiator design. QuantumChem-200K and the corresponding AI assistant together provide the first scalable platform for high-throughput, LLM-driven photoinitiator screening and accelerated discovery of photosensitive materials.

AI.tldr: 该研究创建了包含20万有机分子量子化学性质的大规模数据集QuantumChem-200K，并基于此微调Qwen2.5-32B模型，开发了用于光引发剂设计的化学AI助手，显著提升了双光子吸收和系间窜越等关键性质预测的准确性。
AI.motivation: 当前缺乏包含光解和激发态行为所需量子化学性质的大规模开放数据集，阻碍了双光子聚合用新一代光引发剂的发现。现有分子数据集通常只提供基本的物理化学描述符，无法支持数据驱动的光引发剂筛选或AI辅助设计。
AI.method: 研究构建了包含20万有机分子的QuantumChem-200K数据集，标注了11种量子化学性质，包括双光子吸收截面、双光子吸收光谱范围、单重态-三重态系间窜越能量、毒性、合成可及性评分、亲水性、溶解度、沸点、分子量和芳香性。采用混合计算工作流，整合密度泛函理论、半经验激发态方法、原子量子求解器和神经网络预测器。基于该数据集微调开源Qwen2.5-32B大语言模型，创建能从SMILES进行前向性质预测的化学AI助手。
AI.result: 在VQM24和ZINC20的3000个未见分子上进行基准测试，显示领域特定微调显著提高了预测准确性，优于GPT-4o、Llama-3.1-70B和基础Qwen2.5-32B模型，特别是在光引发剂设计核心的双光子吸收和系间窜越预测方面表现突出。
AI.conclusion: QuantumChem-200K数据集和相应的AI助手共同提供了首个可扩展的高通量、LLM驱动的光引发剂筛选平台，加速了光敏材料的发现进程。

title: Coexistence of near-EF van Hove singularity and in-gap topological Dirac surface states in superconducting electrides
comment: See also our related works on the formation mechanisms of electrides and their connection to SC and unconventional metallic behavior: "Evidence for Anion-Electron Duality and Enhanced Superconducting Role of Interstitial Anionic Electrons in Electrides" and "Interstitial Anionic Electrons-Involved Superconductivity and T-Linear Resistivity Behavior in Electride"
summary: Superconducting electrides have attracted growing attention for their potential to achieve high superconducting transition temperatures (TC) under pressure. However, many known electrides are chemically reactive and unstable, making high-quality single-crystal growth, characterization, and measurements difficult, and most do not exhibit superconductivity at ambient pressure. In contrast, La3In stands out for its ambient-pressure superconductivity (TC ~ 9.4 K) and the availability of high-quality single crystals. Here, we investigate its low-energy electronic structure using angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy and first-principles calculations. The bands near the Fermi energy are mainly derived from La 5d and In 5p orbitals. A saddle point is directly observed at the Brillouin zone (BZ) boundary, while a three-dimensional van Hove singularity crosses EF at the BZ corner. First-principles calculations further reveal topological Dirac surface states within the bulk energy gap above EF. The coexistence of a high density of states and in-gap topological surface states near EF suggests that La3In offers a promising platform for tuning superconductivity and exploring possible topological superconducting phases through doping or external pressure.

AI.tldr: La3In是一种在常压下具有超导性（TC~9.4K）的电子化物，通过ARPES和第一性原理计算揭示了其低能电子结构，包括鞍点、三维van Hove奇点和拓扑狄拉克表面态，为调控超导性和探索拓扑超导相提供了平台。
AI.motivation: 大多数电子化物化学性质活泼、不稳定，难以生长高质量单晶，且在常压下不表现超导性。La3In因其常压超导性和可获得高质量单晶而成为研究电子化物超导机制的理想体系。

AI.result: 费米能级附近的能带主要来自La 5d和In 5p轨道；在布里渊区边界直接观测到鞍点，在布里渊区角处三维van Hove奇点穿过EF；第一性原理计算进一步揭示了在EF上方体带隙内的拓扑狄拉克表面态。

title: Emergent Fermi-liquid-like phase by melting a holon Wigner crystal in a doped Mott insulator on the kagome lattice
summary: The doped quantum spin liquid on the kagome lattice provides a fascinating platform to explore exotic quantum states, such as the reported holon Wigner crystal at low doping. By extending the doping range to $δ= 0.027$ - $0.36$, we study the kagome-lattice $t$-$J$ model using the state-of-the-art density matrix renormalization group calculation. On the $L_y=3$ cylinder ($L_y$ is the number of unit cells along the circumference direction), we establish a quantum phase diagram with increasing doping level. In addition to the charge density wave (CDW) states at lower doping, we find an emergent Fermi-liquid-like phase by melting the holon Wigner crystal at $δ\approx 0.15$, which is characterized by suppression of charge density oscillation and power-law decay of various correlation functions. On the wider $L_y = 4$ cylinder, the bond-dimension extrapolated correlation functions also support such a Fermi-liquid-like state, suggesting its stability with increasing system size. In a narrow doping range near $δ= 1/3$ on the $L_y = 3$ cylinder, we find a state with an exponential decay of single-particle correlation but the other correlation functions preserving the features in the Fermi-liquid-like phase, which may be a precursor of a superconducting state. Nevertheless, this peculiar state near $δ= 1/3$ disappears on the $L_y = 4$ cylinder, implying a possible lattice size dependence. Our results reveal a quantum melting from a holon Wigner crystal to a Fermi-liquid-like state with increasing hole density, and suggest a doping regime to explore superconductivity for future study.

AI.tldr: Kagome晶格t-J模型在掺杂范围δ=0.027-0.36内的量子相图研究，发现从holon维格纳晶体到费米液体态的量子和融转变，并探索了可能的超导前驱态。
AI.motivation: 研究掺杂量子自旋液体在Kagome晶格上的奇异量子态，特别是低掺杂时报道的holon维格纳晶体，并探索更广掺杂范围内的量子相变和可能的新奇量子态。
AI.method: 使用最先进的密度矩阵重整化群方法，在Ly=3和Ly=4的圆柱形几何结构上研究Kagome晶格t-J模型，通过分析电荷密度振荡和各种关联函数的衰减行为来表征不同量子相。
AI.result: 建立了随掺杂水平增加的量子相图：低掺杂时存在电荷密度波态；在δ≈0.15时通过holon维格纳晶体的量子和融出现费米液体态；在δ≈1/3附近发现可能为超导前驱态的奇异态，但该态在Ly=4圆柱上消失，表明可能存在晶格尺寸依赖性。
AI.conclusion: 研究揭示了随着空穴密度增加，从holon维格纳晶体到费米液体态的量子和融转变，并指出了未来探索超导性的掺杂区域，为理解Kagome晶格上的量子相变提供了重要见解。

title: Exact solution for one-dimensional spin models with Markov property
comment: 10 pages, 12 references; will be published in Bulletin of the Russian Academy of Sciences: Physics, Volume 89, supplement issue 3, 2025
summary: For one-dimensional spin and pseudospin models that allow mapping to a Markov chain, the free energy of the system at a finite temperature can be expressed in terms of bond concentrations. Minimizing the free energy function makes it possible to obtain an exact solution of a statistical model. A dilute Ising chain with interacting impurities is considered as an example.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种通过映射到马尔可夫链，用键浓度表示一维自旋/赝自旋模型自由能的方法，并通过最小化自由能函数获得统计模型的精确解，以含相互作用杂质的稀释伊辛链为例进行了验证。
AI.motivation: 研究一维自旋和赝自旋模型的精确求解方法，特别是能够映射到马尔可夫链的模型，旨在发展一种通过键浓度表达自由能并最小化来获得精确解的系统性方法。
AI.method: 将一维自旋/赝自旋模型映射到马尔可夫链，用键浓度表示系统的自由能函数，然后通过最小化自由能函数获得统计模型的精确解。以含相互作用杂质的稀释伊辛链作为具体示例来验证该方法。

title: Protected valley splitting against interface disorder toward scalable silicon electron spin qubits
summary: Regardless of various material design strategies, experimentally achieving substantial and controllable valley splitting in Si/SiGe quantum wells remains a central challenge for ensuring high gate uniformity. This difficulty arises from unavoidable atomic-scale disorder at the interface, caused by alloy randomness, which suppresses valley splitting and, more critically, induces large variations. Here, we demonstrate that CMOS-compatible uniaxial strain can substantially enhance valley splitting, rendering it immune to interface disorder. Atomistic pseudopotential calculations show that uniaxial strain linearly restores the valley splitting suppressed by interfacial disorder, with a large enhancement rate, while keeping disorder-induced variations within a narrow distribution. We reveal that uniaxial strain introduces a new coupling channel between bulk valleys in adjacent Brillouin zones through a small momentum transfer, which markedly reduces the susceptibility of valley splitting to interfacial disorder. These findings establish a viable route to improve gate uniformity in silicon-based spin qubits, paving the way for scalable quantum processors.

AI.tldr: 通过CMOS兼容的单轴应变大幅增强硅量子阱中的谷分裂，使其对界面无序免疫，从而提高量子比特的栅极均匀性。
AI.motivation: 硅/硅锗量子阱中实现可控且显著的谷分裂是确保高栅极均匀性的关键挑战，但界面原子尺度无序（由合金随机性引起）会抑制谷分裂并导致大的变化。
AI.method: 采用原子赝势计算研究单轴应变对谷分裂的影响，揭示应变如何通过小动量转移在相邻布里渊区的体谷之间建立新的耦合通道。
AI.result: 单轴应变能线性恢复被界面无序抑制的谷分裂，具有大的增强速率，同时将无序引起的变化保持在窄分布内，显著降低谷分裂对界面无序的敏感性。
AI.conclusion: CMOS兼容的单轴应变为提高硅基自旋量子比特的栅极均匀性提供了可行途径，有助于实现可扩展的量子处理器。

title: Perspective: Magnon-magnon coupling in hybrid magnonics
summary: The internal coupling of magnetic excitations (magnons) with themselves has created a new research sub-field in hybrid magnonics, i.e., magnon-magnon coupling, which focuses on materials discovery and engineering for probing and controlling magnons in a coherent manner. This is enabled by, one, the abundant mechanisms of introducing magnetic interactions, with examples of exchange coupling, dipolar coupling, RKKY coupling, and DMI coupling, and two, the vast knowledge of how to control magnon band structure, including field and wavelength dependences of frequencies, for determining the degeneracy of magnon modes with different symmetries. In particular, we discuss how magnon-magnon coupling is implemented in various materials systems, with examples of magnetic bilayers, synthetic antiferromagnets, nanomagnetic arrays, layered van der Waals magnets, and (DMI SOT materials) in magnetic multilayers. We then introduce new concept of applications for these hybrid magnonic materials systems, with examples of frequency up/down conversion and magnon-exciton coupling, and discuss what properties are desired for achieving those applications.

AI.tldr: 该论文综述了磁振子-磁振子耦合领域，探讨了不同材料系统中实现磁振子耦合的机制，并介绍了基于这些混合磁振子材料系统的新应用概念。
AI.motivation: 磁振子内部耦合（磁振子-磁振子耦合）已成为混合磁振子学的新研究子领域，旨在通过材料发现和工程实现磁振子的相干探测与控制。
AI.method: 通过多种磁相互作用机制（交换耦合、偶极耦合、RKKY耦合、DMI耦合）以及磁振子能带结构控制（磁场和波长依赖的频率调控）来实现磁振子模式简并。
AI.result: 在多种材料系统中实现了磁振子-磁振子耦合，包括磁性双层膜、合成反铁磁体、纳米磁阵列、层状范德华磁体以及磁多层膜中的DMI SOT材料。
AI.conclusion: 该领域为混合磁振子材料系统开辟了新的应用前景，如频率上下转换和磁振子-激子耦合，并讨论了实现这些应用所需的材料特性。

title: Single-pixel imaging via data-driven and deep image prior dual networks
summary: Single-pixel imaging(SPI),especially when integrated with deep neural networks like deep image prior networks (DIP-Net) or data-driven networks (DD-Net), has gained considerable attention for its capability to generate high-quality reconstructed images, even in the presence of sub-sampling conditions. However, DIP-Net often requires thousands of iterations to achieve high-quality image reconstruction, and DD-Net performs optimally only when the target closely resembles the features present in its training set. To overcome these limitations, we propose a dual-network iterative optimization (SPI-DNIO) framework that combines the strengths of both DD-Net and DIP-Net. It has been demonstrated that this approach can recover high-quality images with fewer iteration steps. Furthermore, to address the challenge of SPI inputs having less effective information at low sampling rates, we have designed a residual block enriched with gradient information, which can convey details to deeper layers, thereby enhancing the deep network's learning capabilities. We have applied these techniques to both indoor experiments with active lighting and outdoor long-range experiments with passive lighting. Our experimental results confirm the exceptional reconstruction capabilities and generalization performance of the SPI-DNIO framework.

AI.tldr: 提出SPI-DNIO框架，结合数据驱动网络和深度图像先验网络的优势，通过梯度信息增强的残差块，在低采样率下实现高质量单像素成像重建。
AI.motivation: 现有单像素成像方法存在不足：深度图像先验网络需要数千次迭代才能获得高质量重建，而数据驱动网络仅在目标特征与训练集相似时表现最佳。需要克服这些限制，特别是在低采样率下输入信息不足的挑战。
AI.method: 提出双网络迭代优化框架SPI-DNIO，结合DD-Net和DIP-Net的优势。设计包含梯度信息的残差块，将细节信息传递到深层网络，增强学习能力。应用于主动光照室内实验和被动光照室外远距离实验。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，SPI-DNIO框架能以更少迭代步骤恢复高质量图像，在低采样率下表现出卓越的重建能力和泛化性能。
AI.conclusion: SPI-DNIO框架有效解决了现有单像素成像方法的局限性，通过双网络协同和梯度增强设计，在多种实验条件下实现了高质量图像重建和良好的泛化能力。

title: A rigorous adiabatic approach to ultracold atom-molecule collisions in a magnetic field
summary: We extend the rigorous adiabatic coupled-channel formalism to ultracold nonreactive atom-molecule collisions in the presence of an external magnetic field. The wavefunction of the collision complex is expanded in adiabatic basis states obtained by solving the eigenvalue problem for the adiabatic Hamiltonian (the total Hamiltonian of the collision complex minus the radial kinetic energy) on a grid of atom-molecule distances $R$. The resulting coupled-channel equations are solved using the diabatic-by-sector method. We show that the adiabatic approach provides accurate cross sections for cold and ultracold Mg ($^1$S) + NH ($^3Σ^-$) collisions in a magnetic field with ~2 times fewer channels than the standard diabatic basis. We further develop an efficient $R$-dependent basis truncation protocol (RBT), in which the elements of the log-derivative matrix are sampled and discarded as it is propagated from small to large $R$. While RBT can be applied in both the adiabatic and diabatic bases, we show that the adiabatic basis can be reduced to just the open channels at long range, leading to an overall computational gain of ~15-30 for the propagation part of the calculation. The gain is particularly significant in situations where substantial errors in the calculated cross sections ($<$50\%) can be tolerated or long-range interactions are involved, making the adiabatic basis formulation a promising approach to strongly anisotropic collisions and chemical reactions in the presence of an external magnetic field.

AI.tldr: 将严格绝热耦合通道形式扩展到存在外磁场下的超冷非反应性原子-分子碰撞，提出R依赖基组截断协议，计算效率提升15-30倍
AI.motivation: 传统对角基方法在处理强各向异性碰撞和存在外磁场的化学反应时计算成本高，需要更高效的数值方法
AI.method: 1) 扩展绝热耦合通道形式到超冷原子-分子碰撞；2) 采用对角分块法求解耦合通道方程；3) 开发R依赖基组截断协议(RBT)，在传播过程中采样并丢弃对数导数矩阵元素
AI.result: 1) 绝热方法比标准对角基少用约2倍通道数；2) RBT协议使传播部分计算增益达15-30倍；3) 在Mg + NH碰撞中验证了准确性
AI.conclusion: 绝热基组公式是处理强各向异性碰撞和存在外磁场的化学反应的有前景方法，特别在可容忍一定误差或涉及长程相互作用时具有显著计算优势

title: Nonequilibrium Quasiparticle Dynamics in a MoRe-Based Superconducting Resonator under IR Excitation
summary: The response of a MoRe-based superconducting resonator operating near 5 K to pulsed infrared irradiation is investigated, and the underlying physical mechanisms are analyzed. The device exhibits a pronounced nonlinear response dominated by nonequilibrium quasiparticle dynamics rather than uniform thermal heating. Infrared pulses produce strong distortions of the resonance curve and a transient decrease in the resonance frequency, consistent with increased kinetic inductance caused by quasiparticle generation. The frequency shift scales approximately linearly with absorbed power, whereas the dissipation response saturates at higher powers, indicating the formation of a nonequilibrium steady-state quasiparticle population. These observations demonstrate a transition from a linear pair-breaking regime to a saturated dissipation regime, likely associated with a quasiparticle relaxation bottleneck or partial suppression of the smaller superconducting gap in MoRe. The results highlight the relevance of nonequilibrium processes in MoRe and confirm its potential for microwave kinetic-inductance detector applications.

AI.tldr: 研究MoRe超导谐振器在5K附近对脉冲红外辐射的响应，发现非线性响应主要由非平衡准粒子动力学而非均匀热加热主导，证实MoRe在微波动力学电感探测器应用中的潜力。
AI.motivation: 研究MoRe超导谐振器对红外辐射的响应机制，理解其非平衡准粒子动力学，评估其在微波动力学电感探测器应用中的潜力。
AI.method: 在5K附近操作MoRe基超导谐振器，施加脉冲红外辐射，测量谐振曲线的畸变和谐振频率的瞬态变化，分析响应与吸收功率的关系。
AI.result: 红外脉冲导致谐振曲线强烈畸变和共振频率瞬态降低，频率偏移与吸收功率近似线性相关，而耗散响应在较高功率下饱和，表明形成了非平衡稳态准粒子群。
AI.conclusion: MoRe超导谐振器的非线性响应由非平衡准粒子动力学主导，而非均匀热加热，证实了从线性对破缺机制到饱和耗散机制的转变，突显了MoRe在微波动力学电感探测器应用中的潜力。

title: Néel Ordered Magnetic Phases in Bipartite Quasicrystals
summary: Magnetism is a fundamental research area in which the recently proposed altermagnetism (AM) has become an emergent frontier. Very recently, the quasicrystal (QC) was proposed as a possible platform to realize AM. However, the existence of AM in QCs still lacks vigorous evidence. In this work, we adopt the sign-problem-free projector quantum Monte Carlo (PQMC) algorithm to investigate the magnetic phases in the half-filled Hubbard models in various 2D bipartite QCs, and always obtain Néel ordered states. While the Néel states in bipartite crystals are usually antiferromagnetism (AFM), we find it common that those in bipartite QCs can also be AM or ferromagnetism (FM). Based on symmetry analysis, combined with our comprehensive PQMC results, we propose a general criterion for determining the magnetism classes of the Néel states in a bipartite QC: According to whether the two sublattices are related by the inversion, the other point-group operation, or no operation about the unique symmetry center in the QC, the corresponding Néel state is AFM, AM or FM, respectively. For example, our results yield AM for the two $D_4$-symmetric Thue-Morse QCs and FM for the $D_5$-symmetric Penrose QC at half-filling. Our results provide a solid foundation for experimental investigations and potential applications of different classes of magnetism in QCs.

AI.tldr: 准晶中的altermagnetism研究：通过量子蒙特卡洛方法发现，在二分准晶中，根据子晶格对称性关系，Néel态可以是反铁磁、交替磁或铁磁。
AI.motivation: 最近提出的altermagnetism成为新兴前沿，准晶被提议作为实现altermagnetism的平台，但准晶中altermagnetism的存在缺乏有力证据。
AI.method: 采用无符号问题的投影量子蒙特卡洛算法，研究各种二维二分准晶中半填充Hubbard模型的磁相，结合对称性分析提出判断准则。
AI.result: 在二分准晶中总是获得Néel有序态，发现这些Néel态可以是反铁磁、交替磁或铁磁。具体地，D4对称Thue-Morse准晶显示交替磁，D5对称Penrose准晶显示铁磁。
AI.conclusion: 提出了判断二分准晶中Néel态磁性类别的一般准则：根据两个子晶格是否通过反演、其他点群操作或无操作相关，分别对应反铁磁、交替磁或铁磁。为实验研究和潜在应用提供了坚实基础。

title: Inferring Tree Structure with Hidden Traps from First Passage Times
summary: Tracking the movement of tracer particles has long been a strategy for uncovering complex structures. Here, we study discrete-time random walks on finite Cayley trees to infer key parameters such as tree depth and geometric bias toward the root or leaves. By analyzing first passage properties, we show that the first two first-passage-time factorial moments (FPTFMs) uniquely determine the tree structure. However, if the random walker experiences waiting phases -- due to sticky branch walls or presence of traps -- this identification becomes nontrivial. We demonstrate that the generating function of the first passage time (FPT) distribution decomposes into contributions from the waiting time distribution and the random walk without waiting, leading to a nonlinear system of equations relating the factorial moments of the waiting time distribution and the FPTFMs of random walks with and without waiting. For geometrically distributed waiting times, additional moment measurements do not suffice, but unique determination of the structure is achieved by varying initial conditions or fitting the Fourier transform of the FPT distribution to measured data. The latter method remains effective also for power-law waiting time distributions, where higher-order FPTFMs are undefined. These results provide a framework for reconstructing tree-like networks from FPT data, with applications in biological transport and spatial networks.

AI.tldr: 通过分析离散时间随机游走在有限凯莱树上的首次通过特性，论文展示了如何从首次通过时间分布推断树结构参数，并研究了等待时间对结构识别的影响。
AI.motivation: 研究如何通过追踪示踪粒子运动来揭示复杂树状网络结构，特别是在存在等待时间（如粘性分支壁或陷阱）的情况下，如何从首次通过时间数据重建树状网络。
AI.method: 分析离散时间随机游走在有限凯莱树上的首次通过特性，使用首次通过时间生成函数分解方法，将等待时间分布与无等待随机游走的贡献分离，建立非线性方程组。
AI.result: 前两个首次通过时间阶乘矩能唯一确定树结构；对于几何分布等待时间，需要改变初始条件或拟合FPT分布的傅里叶变换；对于幂律等待时间分布，后一种方法仍然有效。
AI.conclusion: 建立了一个从首次通过时间数据重建树状网络的框架，适用于生物运输和空间网络等应用场景，即使在存在等待时间的情况下也能有效识别网络结构。

title: Evidence for electron localisation in a moiré-of-moiré superlattice
summary: The localisation of electrons in a lattice potential is an quantum-mechanical phenomenon and is often associated with remarkable physical properties of solids involving electron spins, electric polarisations and topological effects. In particular, even a small amount of distortion of the lattice potential can localise otherwise-delocalised quantum states in low-dimensional electron systems, dramatically influencing their thermodynamic properties and charge-transport behaviour. Study of such electron localisation induced by an aperiodic lattice potential remains exceptionally challenging in solid-state systems, since extrinsic disorders can trivially trap electrons in potential minima near disorders, obscuring the underlying quantum-mechanical origin of localisation phenomena. Van der Waals heterostructures can provide an alternative route for explorations of the phenomena via the emergence of superlattice potentials generated by rotating and stacking individual layers. Here, we report strong signatures of electron localisation in helical trilayer graphene, where the interplay of two moiré patterns gives rise to a moiré-of-moiré superlattice with distinct regions of moiré-periodic and moiré-aperiodic potentials. Remarkably, our measurements reveal the presence of double moiré-induced bands and high-order Brown-Zak oscillations, which are direct reflections of the periodic region with two constituent moiré patterns, and a superimposed anomalous hysteretic signal attributable to the aperiodic region. The data strongly suggest that electron wave functions are partially localised driven by the loss of a periodic lattice potential. Our work provides insight into the effects of spatially inhomogeneous lattice potentials on the low-dimensional electronic states and introduces a promising approach to control electron localisation for practical applications in solid-state devices.

AI.tldr: 在螺旋三层石墨烯中，通过两个莫尔图案的相互作用形成莫尔-莫尔超晶格，其中包含周期性和非周期性区域，导致电子波函数的部分局域化。
AI.motivation: 研究由非周期性晶格势引起的电子局域化现象在固态系统中极具挑战性，因为外在无序会掩盖局域化的量子力学起源。范德华异质结构通过旋转和堆叠层产生超晶格势，为探索这一现象提供了新途径。
AI.method: 使用螺旋三层石墨烯，其中两个莫尔图案的相互作用产生莫尔-莫尔超晶格，包含周期性和非周期性势区域。通过测量双莫尔诱导能带和高阶Brown-Zak振荡来表征电子局域化。
AI.result: 观测到双莫尔诱导能带和高阶Brown-Zak振荡（反映周期性区域），以及叠加的异常滞后信号（归因于非周期性区域）。数据强烈表明电子波函数因周期性晶格势的丧失而部分局域化。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作揭示了空间不均匀晶格势对低维电子态的影响，并为控制电子局域化以实现固态器件的实际应用提供了一种有前景的方法。

title: EPW-VASP interface for first-principles calculations of electron-phonon interactions
summary: We present an interface between the Vienna \textit{Ab initio} Simulation Package (VASP) and the EPW software for calculating materials properties governed by electron-phonon (e-ph) interactions. Computation of the e-ph matrix elements with the finite-difference supercell approach in VASP and their fine-grid interpolation in EPW enable accurate modeling of temperature-dependent materials properties and phonon-assisted quantum processes with VASP's extensive library of exchange-correlation functionals and pseudopotentials. We demonstrate the functionality of the EPW-VASP interface by examining the superconducting gap and critical temperature in MgB$_2$ using the anisotropic Migdal-Eliashberg equations, and the carrier mobility in cubic BN using the \textit{ab initio} Boltzmann transport equation.

AI.tldr: 开发了VASP和EPW软件之间的接口，用于计算电子-声子相互作用相关的材料性质，通过有限差分超胞方法计算矩阵元，并用EPW进行精细网格插值。
AI.motivation: 为了结合VASP丰富的交换关联泛函和赝势库与EPW的电子-声子相互作用计算能力，实现更准确的材料性质模拟，特别是温度依赖性质和声子辅助量子过程。
AI.method: 开发VASP-EPW接口，使用VASP的有限差分超胞方法计算电子-声子矩阵元，然后利用EPW进行精细网格插值，支持各向异性Migdal-Eliashberg方程和第一性原理玻尔兹曼输运方程。
AI.result: 成功演示了接口功能：在MgB₂中计算超导能隙和临界温度，在立方BN中计算载流子迁移率，验证了方法的有效性。
AI.conclusion: VASP-EPW接口为电子-声子相互作用相关的材料性质计算提供了强大工具，结合了两个软件的优势，能够准确模拟温度依赖性质和量子输运过程。

title: Efficient Pseudo-spectral Algorithms for Statistical Field Theories
summary: We present stochastic variants of the exponential time differencing schemes for stiff stochastic differential equations. We derive three explicit schemes that offer better stability compared to Euler-Maruyama and Milstein's method, and achieve strong convergence up to order O(h) in the time step h. We combine these schemes with a pseudo-spectral approach to outline efficient algorithms for simulating stochastic field theories with additive noise. To illustrate the effectiveness of this approach, we study several systems in and out of equilibrium, including Model A, Model B, the Kardar-Parisi-Zhang equation, and the Complex Ginzburg-Landau equation. We outline procedures for computing physical observables such as the critical exponents, correlation functions, and dynamic linear response, and provide our implementation as open source code.

AI.tldr: 提出了随机指数时间差分方案，用于刚性随机微分方程，结合伪谱方法模拟随机场论，并应用于多个平衡与非平衡系统。
AI.motivation: 针对刚性随机微分方程，现有方法如Euler-Maruyama和Milstein方法稳定性不足，需要开发更稳定的显式方案来高效模拟随机场论。
AI.method: 提出了三种显式随机指数时间差分方案，结合伪谱方法，用于模拟具有加性噪声的随机场论，并提供了计算物理可观测量（如临界指数、关联函数）的流程。
AI.result: 新方案比Euler-Maruyama和Milstein方法具有更好的稳定性，在时间步长h上达到O(h)的强收敛阶，成功应用于Model A、Model B、KPZ方程和Complex Ginzburg-Landau方程等系统。
AI.conclusion: 随机指数时间差分方案为刚性随机微分方程提供了稳定高效的数值方法，结合伪谱方法可有效模拟随机场论，代码已开源供研究使用。

title: Two-dimensional fluorescence spectroscopy with quantum entangled photons: Idler-referenced timing without pump detection
summary: Entangled photons have attracted increasing interest as resources for developing time-resolved spectroscopic techniques. Theoretical studies suggest that their non-classical correlations enable time-resolved spectroscopy with monochromatic pumping and can selectively isolate specific Liouville pathways in nonlinear optical signals. In an earlier study, we proposed a fluorescence detection scheme that could, in principle, be implemented using existing single-photon detectors [Y. Fujihashi et al., arXiv:2502.02073 (2025)]. In that design, the time origin was defined by detecting the arrival of the pulsed laser used to pump the nonlinear crystal for spontaneous parametric down-conversion, a requirement that made the overall experiment cumbersome. This study theoretically examines an alternative protocol that defines the reference time based on the arrival of idler photons. We demonstrate that this idler-referenced scheme functions effectively when the entangled photons exhibit either negative or negligible frequency correlations. Eliminating the pump-timing channel simplifies the optical layout and lowers the experimental barrier to realizing time-resolved two-dimensional fluorescence spectroscopy with entangled photons. Although the photons may exhibit frequency correlations in isolation, their frequency-time degrees of freedom can behave as effectively uncorrelated when considered over the full measurement timescale. Therefore, fully exploiting non-classical correlations requires an entangled photon source whose temporal characteristics are carefully matched to the overall timescale of the experiment.

AI.tldr: 提出基于闲频光子到达时间作为参考的时域分辨二维荧光光谱方案，简化实验装置，降低实现门槛
AI.motivation: 先前方案需要检测泵浦激光脉冲到达时间作为时间原点，使实验复杂繁琐。本研究旨在简化实验装置，降低实现纠缠光子时域分辨二维荧光光谱的技术门槛
AI.method: 提出替代方案：以闲频光子的到达时间作为参考时间原点，而非泵浦激光脉冲。理论上分析该方案在纠缠光子具有负频率相关或可忽略频率相关时的有效性
AI.result: 闲频参考方案在纠缠光子具有负频率相关或可忽略频率相关时有效。即使光子本身存在频率相关，在完整测量时间尺度上其频率-时间自由度可表现为有效不相关
AI.conclusion: 消除泵浦时间通道简化了光学布局，降低了实验难度。要充分利用非经典相关性，需要精心匹配纠缠光子源的时间特性与实验整体时间尺度

title: Coherent subgap transport in spin-split Josephson junctions
summary: We report the first experimental observation of subgap transport in ferromagnetic insulator/superconductor/insulator/superconductor junctions realized in EuS/Al/AlOx/Al vertical stacks. Differential conductance measurements reveal multiple Andreev reflection peaks, with odd-order peaks split by the spin-splitting induced in the superconductor adjacent to EuS, while even-order peaks remain unaffected. Combining experiments with quasiclassical transport modeling, we extract the spin-splitting and the distribution of transmission channels, finding that a significant fraction ($\sim 23\%$) of highly transparent channels ($τ\approx 0.9$) dominates transport. The observation of a Josephson current further confirms strong superconducting coupling through these channels. Our results demonstrate that a single spin-split superconductor is sufficient to observe the even-odd MAR effect. Our work establishes EuS/Al junctions as a versatile platform to study subgap transport, Josephson coupling, and spin-polarized superconducting phenomena.

AI.tldr: 首次在EuS/Al/AlOx/Al垂直堆叠的磁性绝缘体/超导体/绝缘体/超导体结中观察到亚能隙输运，发现奇数次安德烈夫反射峰受自旋劈裂影响而分裂，偶数次峰不受影响，揭示了高透明通道主导输运。
AI.motivation: 研究磁性绝缘体/超导体结中的亚能隙输运现象，探索自旋劈裂超导体对安德烈夫反射的影响，建立研究自旋极化超导现象的平台。
AI.method: 使用EuS/Al/AlOx/Al垂直堆叠结构制备结，进行微分电导测量，结合准经典输运模型分析，提取自旋劈裂和传输通道分布。
AI.result: 观察到奇数次安德烈夫反射峰因自旋劈裂而分裂，偶数次峰保持不变；约23%的高透明通道（τ≈0.9）主导输运；观测到约瑟夫森电流证实强超导耦合。
AI.conclusion: 单个自旋劈裂超导体足以观察到奇偶MAR效应，EuS/Al结成为研究亚能隙输运、约瑟夫森耦合和自旋极化超导现象的多功能平台。

title: Large out-of-equilibrium magnetocaloric effect in rare-earth zirconate pyrochlores
summary: We explore the magnetic properties of Nd$_2$Zr$_2$O$_7$ and Pr$_2$Zr$_2$O$_7$ single crystals subjected to pulsed magnetic fields up to 60 T using magnetization and magnetocaloric-effect (MCE) measurements, with initial temperatures ranging from 2 to 31K. The MCE data exhibit pronounced and unconventional hysteresis loops, in which the sample temperature increases during both the up-sweep and down-sweep of the field. In Nd$_2$Zr$_2$O$_7$, the MCE further displays a striking plateau as a function of time, followed by a rapid temperature rise that begins at the maximum applied field, across pulses with differing peak-field strengths. Our magnetization measurements reveal an inferred temperature of the magnetic subsystem that differs significantly from the directly measured sample temperature and exhibits opposite hysteresis: the temperature is higher on the up-sweep than the down-sweep, unlike the direct measurements. These observations indicate a breakdown of thermal equilibrium between magnetic and lattice degrees of freedom on the timescale of the pulse ($\sim 10^{-1}$s). We interpret the results using a phenomenological model involving two thermally coupled subsystems - the magnetic ions and phonons, and a thermal reservoir, which accounts well for the behavior of Pr$_2$Zr$_2$O$_7$. However, it fails to reproduce the plateau seen in Nd$_2$Zr$_2$O$_7$. Agreement with Nd$_2$Zr$_2$O$_7$ data is improved substantially if we allow the thermal coupling between the magnetic and the lattice subsystems to depend on the product $\frac{HdH}{dt}$. Our results reveal anomalously slow heat transfer between magnetic and lattice subsystems and point toward a novel mechanism for dynamically controlling the heat flow in Nd$_2$Zr$_2$O$_7$ via the rate of magnetic field variation.

AI.tldr: 研究Nd₂Zr₂O₇和Pr₂Zr₂O₇单晶在脉冲磁场下的磁性和磁热效应，发现磁子系统与晶格之间存在热非平衡现象，特别是Nd₂Zr₂O₇中观察到异常的慢热传递机制。
AI.motivation: 探索稀土锆酸盐材料在强脉冲磁场下的磁热效应和热动力学行为，研究磁子系统与晶格之间的热耦合机制，特别是在非平衡条件下的热传递特性。
AI.method: 使用脉冲磁场（最高60T）对Nd₂Zr₂O₇和Pr₂Zr₂O₇单晶进行磁化强度和磁热效应测量，温度范围2-31K。采用包含磁离子、声子和热库三个热耦合子系统的唯象模型进行分析。
AI.result: 观察到非传统的磁热效应滞后回线，样品温度在磁场上升和下降过程中均升高。Nd₂Zr₂O₇中磁热效应显示平台特征，随后在最大磁场处快速升温。磁化测量推断的磁子系统温度与直接测量的样品温度存在显著差异，显示相反的热滞后行为。
AI.conclusion: 磁子系统与晶格在脉冲时间尺度（~10⁻¹s）上存在热非平衡。Nd₂Zr₂O₇中热传递异常缓慢，热耦合强度依赖于磁场变化速率HdH/dt，这为通过磁场变化速率动态控制热流提供了新机制。

title: Exact four-vector work distribution and covariant Jarzynski's equality for a relativistic particle in an expanding piston
summary: We investigate the non-equilibrium four-vector work in an expanding relativistic piston. By deriving the exact work distribution in this pedagogical model, we verify the covariant form of Jarzynski's equality. We find that the joint distribution of four-vector work $(W^0, W^1)$ concentrates on the origin and some curves in the $(W^0, W^1)$ space, rather than being smoothly distributed. In the non-relativistic limit, our model consistently recovers the non-relativistic dynamics. We further demonstrate that the momentum component of four-vector work remains significant in both the Lorentz-relativistic and Galilean-relativistic frameworks. In addition, we introduce a novel geometrical technique for analyzing the dynamics of relativistic collision processes, which can be straightforwardly extended to three-dimensional piston models.

AI.tldr: 研究膨胀相对论活塞中的非平衡四矢量功，验证Jarzynski等式的协变形式，发现功分布集中在原点及曲线上而非平滑分布。
AI.motivation: 研究相对论系统中非平衡热力学的四矢量功特性，验证Jarzynski等式在相对论框架下的协变性，探索相对论活塞模型中的功分布特征。
AI.method: 建立膨胀相对论活塞模型，推导四矢量功的精确分布，采用几何技术分析相对论碰撞过程动力学，并考虑非相对论极限验证一致性。
AI.result: 验证了Jarzynski等式的协变形式，发现四矢量功的联合分布集中在原点及曲线上而非平滑分布，动量分量在洛伦兹和伽利略相对论框架中均保持显著。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了相对论活塞中四矢量功的理论框架，验证了协变Jarzynski等式，提出的几何方法可扩展到三维活塞模型，为相对论非平衡热力学研究提供了新工具。

title: Hybrid structure with a ferromagnetic film and an array of magnetic molecules for deep-nanoscale reprogrammable magnonics
summary: Miniaturization is an essential element in the development of information processing technologies and is also one of the main determinants of the usability of the tested artificial neural networks. It is also a key element and one of the main challenges in the development of magnonic neuromorphic systems. In this work, we propose a new platform for the development of these new spin-wave-based technologies. Using micromagnetic simulations, we demonstrate that magnetic molecules regularly arranged on the surface of a thin ferromagnetic layer enable resonant coupling of propagating spin waves with the dynamics of the molecules' magnetic moments, opening a gap in the transmission spectrum up to 150 MHz. The gap, its width, and frequency can be controlled by an external magnetic field or the arrangement of molecules on the ferromagnetic surface. Furthermore, the antiferromagnetic arrangement of the magnetic moments of molecules or clusters of molecules allows for control of the gap's position and width. Thus, the proposed hybrid structure offers reprogrammability and miniaturization down to the deep nanoscale, operating frequencies in the range of several GHz, key properties for the implementation of artificial neural networks.

AI.tldr: 提出一种基于磁性分子与自旋波共振耦合的混合结构，用于实现可重构的纳米尺度磁子神经形态系统
AI.motivation: 微型化是信息处理技术发展的关键要素，也是磁子神经形态系统开发的主要挑战之一。需要开发能够在纳米尺度工作、具有可重构性的新型平台。
AI.method: 通过微磁模拟，研究在薄铁磁层表面规则排列的磁性分子与传播自旋波之间的共振耦合。利用外部磁场或分子排列方式控制传输谱中的带隙特性。
AI.result: 磁性分子与自旋波共振耦合可在传输谱中产生高达150 MHz的带隙。带隙的频率、宽度和位置可通过外部磁场或分子排列方式控制，反铁磁排列的分子或分子簇可进一步调控带隙特性。
AI.conclusion: 提出的混合结构具有可重构性和深纳米尺度的微型化能力，工作频率在GHz范围内，这些特性对于实现人工神经网络至关重要，为磁子神经形态系统提供了新平台。

title: Demonstration of the ODMR activity of the telecom range ClV center in SiC: a wavefunction theory analysis
comment: Main document: 8 pages, 4 figures; Supplementary information: 66 pages, 2 figures
summary: Recently, density functional theory-based high-throughput screening of point defects in 4H-SiC revealed the positively charged chlorine-vacancy (ClV) defect to be a promising quantum bit candidate emitting at telecom wavelengths, with an electronic structure analogous to the well-known NV center in diamond. Furthermore, recent infrared photoluminescence (PL) measurements on chlorine-implanted 4H-SiC have revealed new PL lines associated with the ClV defect. While the defect possesses a high-spin ground state, there is a lack of evidence of optically detected magnetic resonance (ODMR), a key ingredient for optical spin initialization and readout. In this Letter, we employ a multireference wavefunction-based quantum chemistry method, specifically, second-order perturbation theory (NEVPT2) on top of a defect-localized many-body wavefunction (CASSCF), to explore the many-body electronic structure of the ClV center. We estimate photoluminescence, internal conversion, and intersystem crossing rates to investigate the possibility of spin polarization and ODMR activity. Our findings establish the ClV center in 4H-SiC as an optically addressable spin qubit with fiber optics compatibility in the technologically mature 4H-SiC host material, enabling the development of large-scale quantum networks.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过量子化学方法研究4H-SiC中氯空位缺陷的电子结构，证实其可作为光纤兼容的光学寻址自旋量子比特，有望用于大规模量子网络。
AI.motivation: 先前研究发现4H-SiC中的氯空位缺陷具有类似金刚石NV中心的电子结构，是潜在的量子比特候选，但缺乏光学检测磁共振证据，这是光学自旋初始化和读取的关键。
AI.method: 采用多参考波函数量子化学方法，具体是基于缺陷局域多体波函数的二阶微扰理论，计算光致发光、内转换和系间窜越速率，研究自旋极化和ODMR活性可能性。
AI.result: 研究证实ClV中心在4H-SiC中可作为光学寻址的自旋量子比特，具有光纤兼容性，能够在成熟的4H-SiC材料中实现大规模量子网络。
AI.conclusion: ClV中心在4H-SiC中是一个有前景的光学寻址自旋量子比特，其光纤兼容性和成熟的主材料特性使其适合大规模量子网络应用。

title: Robust Indexing for Challenging Serial X-ray Diffraction Patterns
summary: Serial crystallography experiments routinely produce thousands of diffraction patterns from crystals in random orientations. To turn this stream of images into a usable dataset, each pattern must be indexed before integration and merging can proceed. In practice, diffraction patterns may contain only a small number of reliable peaks, be contaminated by background or spuriously detected reflections, or arise from crystals with highly skewed unit cells. These factors make indexing unstable in the small-N regime. We introduce a robust indexing algorithm tailored to this setting. We formulate indexing as a symmetry-aware lattice decoding problem and design a loss that explicitly incorporates lattice symmetries while trimming outlier peaks that are inconsistent with any plausible orientation. We combine this objective with a reciprocal-space basis reparameterization that stabilizes decoding for skewed or poorly conditioned lattices, and we develop a dedicated small-N objective mode that couples refined peak scoring with a method to recover orientations from very few reflections. The resulting method is memory-efficient and suitable for robust indexing. We evaluate our approach on three protein datasets from the Coherent X-ray Imaging Data Bank collected at XFEL facilities, using identical preprocessing and unit-cell information across methods. Across all datasets, our algorithm matches or outperforms established indexers such as XGANDALF and TORO, with particularly large gains for patterns with few indexed peaks and for crystals with skewed unit cells. While slower, our method is extremely memory-efficient, and its structure allows high-parallelism on CPUs or larger batch sizes on GPUs. These results show that exploiting lattice structure, symmetry, and small-N-aware search yields substantial improvements in indexing robustness.

AI.tldr: 提出一种针对少量可靠衍射峰的稳健晶体学索引算法，通过对称感知晶格解码和异常值修剪，在蛋白质数据集上优于现有方法
AI.motivation: 串行晶体学实验中，衍射图案可能包含少量可靠峰、背景污染或来自高度倾斜晶胞的晶体，导致在少量峰情况下索引不稳定
AI.method: 将索引问题建模为对称感知晶格解码，设计包含晶格对称性的损失函数并修剪异常峰；采用倒易空间基重参数化稳定倾斜晶胞的解码；开发专用的小峰数目标模式，结合精炼峰评分和从极少反射中恢复取向的方法
AI.result: 在三个XFEL设施收集的蛋白质数据集上评估，使用相同预处理和晶胞信息，算法匹配或优于XGANDALF和TORO等现有索引器，在少量索引峰和倾斜晶胞情况下优势显著；内存效率高，适合并行计算
AI.conclusion: 利用晶格结构、对称性和小峰数感知搜索能显著提高索引稳健性，为串行晶体学数据处理提供更可靠的解决方案

title: Predicting complete basis set limit quasiparticle energies from triple-$ζ$ calculations
summary: We present a simple linear model to estimate the basis set incompleteness errors (BSIE) of (vertex-corrected) $GW$ QP energies based on the kinetic energy of the corresponding orbital only. We parametrise the model for $G_0W_0$, quasi-particle self-consistent $GW$ (qs$GW$), and vertex-corrected ($Σ^{BSE}@L^{BSE}$) QP energies on a large set of molecules containing 10 different elements for which we calculate complete basis set (CBS) limit extrapolated reference values with correlation-consistent basis sets ranging from triple- to hextuple-$ζ$ (TZ/6Z). Based on these accurate reference values, we obtain model parameters for Gaussian-type and Slater-type orbital (GTO/STO) basis sets which allow for the extrapolation of QP energies calculated with TZ basis sets to the CBS limit with errors of 20 to 30 meV. Analysing extrapolation errors, we show the commonly used extrapolation method which assumes an inverse linear dependence of the BSIE on the inverse number of basis functions to be valid, but to produce larger errors, even when a quadruple-$ζ$ calculation is used in the extrapolation.

AI.tldr: 提出一个基于轨道动能估计GW方法基组不完备误差的简单线性模型，参数化后可将TZ基组计算的准粒子能量外推到CBS极限，误差仅20-30 meV。

AI.method: 基于轨道动能建立简单线性模型估计BSIE，在包含10种元素的大分子集上参数化G0W0、qsGW和顶点校正方法，使用TZ到6Z相关一致基组计算CBS极限参考值。
AI.result: 获得了GTO和STO基组的模型参数，可将TZ基组计算的准粒子能量外推到CBS极限，误差仅20-30 meV。验证了常用外推方法的有效性但误差更大。

title: Plasmon excitations and their attenuation in dirty superconductors
summary: We develop a theory for the plasmon spectrum in dirty superconductors across the entire temperature range. Starting with the microscopic Keldysh sigma model description, we link the plasmon dispersion $ω(q)$ to the optical conductivity $σ(ω,T)$ of a superconductor, which requires analytical continuation to the lower half-plane of complex frequency. This approach reveals a discontinuity at the superconducting transition: a jump in both the real and imaginary parts of $ω(q)$ at $T_c$. For any temperature below $T_c$, the plasmon dispersion terminates at a critical wave vector $q_c(T)$ where plasmons remains undamped, with $ω[q_c(T)] \approx 2Δ(0)$. Plasmons significantly attenuate only within a narrow 5% temperature window near $T_c$, with the propagating mode recovering at large $q$.

AI.tldr: 该研究建立了脏超导体中整个温度范围内的等离子体激元谱理论，揭示了在超导转变温度Tc处等离子体激元色散关系的突变，以及低于Tc时等离子体激元在临界波矢qc(T)处终止且保持无阻尼的特性。
AI.motivation: 研究脏超导体中等离子体激元在整个温度范围内的行为，特别是理解超导转变对等离子体激元色散和阻尼特性的影响。
AI.method: 从微观Keldysh sigma模型描述出发，将等离子体激元色散ω(q)与超导体的光学电导率σ(ω,T)联系起来，需要对复频率下半平面进行解析延拓。
AI.result: 发现超导转变处存在不连续性：在Tc处ω(q)的实部和虚部均发生跳跃。低于Tc时，等离子体激元色散在临界波矢qc(T)处终止，此时ω[qc(T)]≈2Δ(0)且保持无阻尼。等离子体激元仅在接近Tc的5%窄温度窗口内显著衰减，在大q时传播模式恢复。
AI.conclusion: 该理论揭示了脏超导体中等离子体激元行为的完整温度依赖性，特别是超导转变对等离子体激元特性的显著影响，为理解超导材料中的集体激发提供了新见解。

title: Tensor complex renormalization with generalized symmetry and topological bootstrap
summary: Recent progress in generalized symmetry and topological holography has shown that, in conformal field theory (CFT), topological data from one dimensional higher can play a key role in determining local dynamics. Based on this insight, a fixed-point (FP) tensor complex (TC) for CFT has recently been constructed. In this work, we develop a TC renormalization (TCR) algorithm adapted to this CFT-based structure, forming a renormalization-group (RG) framework with generalized symmetry. We show that the full FP tensor can emerge from the RG flow starting with only the three-point function of the primary fields. Remarkably, even when starting solely from topological data, the RG process can still reconstruct the full FP tensor--a method we call as topological bootstrap. This approach deepens the connection between the topological and dynamical aspects of CFT and suggests pathways toward a fully algebraic description of gapless quantum states, with potential extensions to higher dimensions.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于张量复形的CFT重整化算法，能从拓扑数据重建完整定点张量
AI.motivation: 基于广义对称性和拓扑全息原理，探索CFT中拓扑数据与局部动力学的关系，建立拓扑与动力学方面的深层联系
AI.method: 开发了张量复形重整化算法，形成具有广义对称性的重整化群框架，从初级场的三点函数出发进行RG流
AI.result: RG流能从初级场三点函数产生完整定点张量，即使仅从拓扑数据出发也能重建完整张量（拓扑自举方法）
AI.conclusion: 该方法深化了CFT拓扑与动力学方面的联系，为无能隙量子态的完全代数描述提供了途径，并可扩展到更高维度

title: Equivalence of residual entropy of hexagonal and cubic ices from tensor network methods
summary: The long-standing question of whether the residual entropy of hexagonal ice ($S_h$) equals that of cubic ice ($S_c$) remains unresolved despite decades of research on ice-type models. While analytical studies have established the inequality $S_h \geq S_c$, numerical investigations suggest that the two values are very close. In this work, we revisit this problem using high-precision tensor-network methods. In Monte Carlo approaches the residual entropy cannot be directly obtained by sampling the ground-state degeneracy space, however, the tensor-network framework enables an explicit encoding of the "ice rule'' into local tensors, and then the residual entropy is transformed into finding the largest eigenvalue of a transfer operator in the form of a projected entangled-pair operator, which allows high-accuracy numerical evaluation. Meanwhile, we propose a new perspective based on analyzing the normality of the transfer operator, and demonstrate that if the operator is normal, the equality $S_h = S_c$ follows directly. Then the variational tensor network methods are employed to numerically verify this normality. Finally both residual entropies are directly computed by using our recently developed split corner transfer matrix renormalization group algorithm, providing a rigorous evidence supporting the equality between $S_h$ and $S_c$.

AI.motivation: 解决长期存在的六角冰和立方冰残余熵是否相等的争议问题
AI.method: 采用高精度张量网络方法，将冰规则编码到局部张量中，通过转移算子的正规性分析和变分张量网络验证，最后使用分裂角转移矩阵重整化群算法直接计算
AI.result: 证明了转移算子的正规性，并通过直接计算提供了六角冰和立方冰残余熵相等的严格证据
AI.conclusion: 六角冰和立方冰的残余熵确实相等，解决了数十年来的争议

title: Extended Multi-Temperature Model for Electron--Phonon Coupling and Ultrafast Thermal Transport in Graphene
summary: Ultrafast thermal transport in low-dimensional materials challenges traditional diffusive models due to reduced scattering, strong electron-phonon coupling, and pronounced non-equilibrium effects. To address these complexities, we extend the macroscopic multi-temperature model by incorporating non-diffusive and non-local phenomena, treating electrons, optical phonons, and acoustic phonons as coupled but thermally distinct subsystems. We benchmark this enhanced framework against the multi-temperature Boltzmann transport equation, enabling detailed resolution of branch-dependent energy relaxation and identifying bottlenecks in thermalization. This approach provides a more accurate and comprehensive description of heat flow in emerging materials, offering novel insights into phonon dynamics and electron-phonon interactions. These theoretical advances pave the way for the improved design and optimization of next-generation nanoelectronic and photothermal devices.

AI.tldr: 扩展宏观多温度模型以包含非扩散和非局域现象，用于描述低维材料中的超快热输运，通过耦合电子、光学声子和声学声子子系统来更准确地模拟热流。

AI.method: 扩展宏观多温度模型，纳入非扩散和非局域现象，将电子、光学声子和声学声子作为耦合但热学上独立的子系统处理，并与多温度玻尔兹曼输运方程进行基准测试。
AI.result: 该增强框架能够详细解析分支依赖的能量弛豫，识别热化过程中的瓶颈，为新兴材料中的热流提供更准确和全面的描述，揭示了声子动力学和电子-声子相互作用的新见解。

title: Anomalous spin-lattice coupling in a 2D antiferromagnetic semiconductor revealed by surface acoustic Rayleigh waves
summary: Magnetic order in van der Waals magnets can strongly influence their lattice dynamics, yet how this interaction manifests across different phonon length scales remains unclear. Optical phonons probe bond-scale exchange modulation and short-range spin correlations, whereas long-wavelength acoustic modes couple to uniform strain fields and are sensitive to the renormalization of the macroscopic elastic tensor associated with long-range magnetic order. Experimentally accessing these low-energy acoustic excitations in low-dimensional crystals is challenging due to their low energies and the small lateral dimensions of exfoliated samples. Here, we employ angle-resolved Brillouin-Mandelstam scattering spectroscopy to investigate the surface acoustic phonon spectrum of exfoliated NiPS3 thin films across their antiferromagnetic transition temperature. Our results show a single Rayleigh surface mode whose phase velocity exhibits a pronounced 5.5% softening upon cooling through the Neel temperature. This anomaly reflects a giant magnetoelastic renormalization of the long-wavelength elastic constants triggered by the onset of zigzag antiferromagnetic order. First-principles calculations of the full elastic tensor, combined with continuum finite-element modelling of the NiPS3/SiO2/Si heterostructure, reproduce both the Rayleigh-wave dispersion and its magnetic-order-induced shift. The obtained results reveal how microscopic exchange interactions shape macroscopic mechanical properties in two-dimensional antiferromagnetic semiconductors, providing a basis for lattice-controlled magnetism and magnetically tunable phononic, magnonic, and strain-mediated spintronic device concepts.

AI.tldr: 该研究使用布里渊-曼德尔斯塔姆散射光谱测量了NiPS3薄膜的表面声子谱，发现其瑞利表面波在通过奈尔温度时相位速度出现5.5%软化，揭示了二维反铁磁半导体中微观交换相互作用如何影响宏观力学性质。
AI.motivation: 研究二维范德华磁体中磁序与晶格动力学的相互作用，特别是不同长度尺度声子模式的响应差异。长波长声学模式对长程磁序敏感，但在低维晶体中实验测量这些低能声子激发具有挑战性。
AI.method: 采用角度分辨布里渊-曼德尔斯塔姆散射光谱技术，测量剥离NiPS3薄膜的表面声子谱；结合第一性原理计算弹性张量和连续介质有限元建模NiPS3/SiO2/Si异质结构。
AI.result: 观测到单个瑞利表面模式，其相位速度在冷却通过奈尔温度时出现5.5%的显著软化；该异常反映了长波长弹性常数的巨大磁弹性重整化，由锯齿形反铁磁序的起始触发。
